entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • XAML resource keys cannot be extracted into string constants #21196
  • SecureStorage in iOS simulator #21195
  • [Windows] Webview memory leak #21194
  • Publishing MAUI app with static resources fails #21193
  • Multi-Project App template misses out on defining the Style named Headline and Subheadline, thus resulting in an App crash on launch #21190
  • Multi-Project App Template is not generating a solution file when used from CLI #21188
    Backlog
  • Android NavigationPage hides the previous page before back navigation #21187
    Backlog
  • Android Border CustomHandler Drag Event #21186
    Backlog
  • iOS - Auth Login WebAuthenticator crash with Universal linking #21183
  • Can't find debug target or "{}" #21182
  • PropertyChanged event not picked up for bound indexed property in Release mode with Compiled Bindings #21181
    Backlog
  • Adding TapGestureRecognizer to Child control restricts touch for Parent control in Android platform #21180
    Backlog
  • .net8 maui CollectionView.Header bug? #21179
  • Window was already created #21178
  • Android Border with RoundRectangle Stroke does not correctly round corners of things within it #21173
    Backlog
  • Cannot put spaces in project names - Maui then attempts to use underscores in App manifest name which are not allowed - causes failure to build #21172
  • .NET 8.0.10 breaks MAUI builds #21170
    Backlog

Closed

  • Pixelated Edges on Splashscreen on Android #20823
    Backlog
  • Android Systemfonts (light/black etc.) not working #19556
  • [BUG] Setting MapType to MapType.Hybrid for Windows does not display street labels with the map #21163
  • Suggestion: Incorporating Animated Full Image Splash Screen in .NET MAUI #21171
  • Can't "Pair to Mac" with Visual Studio 17.9.3 #21174
  • About the problem that the VS17.9.3 version project references the Maui version #21177
  • About the VS17.9.3 version and the Maui version #21176
  • Finished creating package, but nothing package found #21153

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix XmlType .Equals override #21192
  • [Span] Improve attribute inheritance #21191
  • [Testing] Ported legacy tests to Appium #21175
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Cache SKPath to PathF.PlatformPath in Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Skia #21169
  • [Android] Fixed customising alert buttons' colors (#20108) #21167
    community ✨

Merged

  • [Android] System Fonts fix #20961
    platform/android 🤖, area/fonts 🅰️, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 branch #21145
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net8.0 branch #21146
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Fixes BindableLayout BindingContext inheritance #17290
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, memory-leak 💦
  • [iOS] Implemented PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden, PrefersStatusBarHidden and PreferredStatusBarUpdateAnimation Platform Specifics #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Testing] Updated to latest RC.6 of Appium #20694
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Windows] Add hot reload support for ListView #20144
    platform/windows 🪟, area/ListView, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • [iOS] Fix UI loop when setting ContentInset #21140
  • [Android] Ecosystem updates WAS:Google Maps bump/update #20783
    platform/android 🤖, area/Maps🗺
  • [ios] fix memory leak in RadioButton #21151
  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Docs] Update Shell inline comments #20912
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Trimming] Enable trimming and AOT analyzers in Core #21076
    area/app-size 🤏
  • [DRAFT] Update the macios dependencies to new package names. #21152
    do-not-merge
  • Make sure to await async test asserts (2) #20506
    area/testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20700
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
